name: SmallBigLittleDreams
description:
Just so you know, this is my first "big" game I ever made. I'm still learning to code. This game was made in a game engine called "Gameguru". I'm  currently working on a game in unreal engine 4. But thanks for downloading! Leave your thought's in the comments :)

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0YIIADsbsDvaJ2360QVzOg?guided_help_flow=3
